turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Please order me a coffee from Starbucks.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Which one would you like to order from?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: The one at Jacksonville Mall on Western Blvd.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Okay. What size and type would you like?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: I want a Grande latte.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: What type of milk.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Skim, please

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Do you want that hot or cold?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Hot.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: And would you like any flavors?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: I want mocha. Sugar free mocha.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Great. So that is a Grande skinny sugar free mocha hot latte.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Yes. Add Splenda to that please.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Okay, Splenda added. Anything else?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: No, that's it.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: I have placed your order for a Grande skinny sugar free mocha hot latte with Splenda at the Jacksonville Mall Starbucks. It will be ready shortly.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Great!

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Payment has been processed to your credit card and your receipt will be sent by text.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Thanks.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: You're welcome. Enjoy your coffee.
